title: Dear Sarah
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Dear Sarah**

Dear Sarah is a [Victorian era](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Victorian%20era) [handwriting font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/handwriting%20font) designed by [Christian Robertson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Robertson) in 2004. The typeface is based on his own handwriting and named after his wife, Sarah Robertson. Dear Sarah was developed in both [AAT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AAT) and [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) versions.

Dear Sarah is sold exclusively through [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer).

**Discussion:**  
 [Dear Sarah](http://web.archive.org/web/20131008062050/http:/www.typophile.com/dear_sarah)
author: Jared Benson
